channel.title: Posts on RHS Racing
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on RHS Racing

item.title: Car Design Update
item.description:
Good news! The team has been working hard on the design of our F1 in Schools car.

This is our current progress for our car design. It shows the in-progress design of our car from five different angles. We’re really pleased with our progress and really excited to finish it off.

item.title: Our Website is Live!
item.description: Our new website is live. We are looking forward to sharing our project’s progress with you.
